name: Speedrunner (itch) (Superblitz101)
description:
Speedrunner is a game about overcoming platforming challenges in the fastest possible time. The game currently consists of 3 prototype levels for your enjoyment. I am keen to hear what you think of the game so far! 

You can join my discord at https://discord.gg/ygNe5gr4sv or contact me via email at speedrunner.official.game@gmail.com to let me know what you liked/didnt like, or any bugs you came across.

The basic controls for the game are as follows:

move: WASD/left stick 

Jump: Space/south button 

dash: Shift/L2 

reset position: R/west button 

menu: esc/options(PS4) 

camera: mouse/right stick

The game also allows you to enhance your jump as below

Long jump: dash -> jump

High jump: jump -> dash

Double jump -> dash while falling
